text: Even in death, you'll not see beyond the Phantom Veil.

text: I can't bear to be seen...

name: phass_death_05

name: phass_fastres_01
text: Don't think you're done with me.

name: phass_respawn_01
text: Next time, I'll assess before I assassinate.
text_simple: next time ill assess before i assassinate

name: phass_respawn_02
text: It's all coming back into focus...
text_simple: its all coming back into focus

name: phass_respawn_03
text: Bet you're glad to see me again.
text_simple: bet youre glad to see me again

name: phass_respawn_05

text_simple: let me pull aside the veil of secrecy

name: phass_arc_invis_02
text: Beyond the reach of mortal eyes.
text_simple: beyond the reach of mortal eyes

name: pa_asan_ally_300
text: When my path grows uncertain, I can always trust on kindly revenants to appear.
text_simple: when my path grows uncertain i can always trust on kindly revenants to appear

name: pa_asan_ally_301
text: To you I owe everything. I won't let us fail.
text_simple: to you i owe everything i wont let us fail

name: pa_asan_ally_302
text: Now I know why I was drawn to this fight.
text_simple: now i know why i was drawn to this fight

name: pa_asan_ally_303
text: My childhood dream comes true -- to fight at your side.
text_simple: my childhood dream comes true to fight at your side

name: pa_asan_ally_304
text: With victory here, we'll have the power to set past suffering to right.
text_simple: with victory here well have the power to set past suffering to right

name: pa_asan_ally_305
text: Guide my hand, mother. I shall kill for you like always.
text_simple: guide my hand mother i shall kill for you like always

name: pa_asan_big_crit_09
text: I really thought that would kill you...
text_simple: i really thought that would kill you

name: pa_asan_death_rival_06
text: I should have taken...my own life...
text_simple: i should have taken my own life

name: pa_asan_intro_06
text: For a future none of you will live to see.
text_simple: for a future none of you will live to see

name: pa_asan_intro_07
text: You failed to kill me in the cradle.
text_simple: you failed to kill me in the cradle

name: pa_asan_intro_08
text: Now that failure brings you here.
text_simple: now that failure brings you here

name: pa_asan_intro_14
text: And your vast number only betrays your fear.
text_simple: and your vast number only betrays your fear

name: pa_asan_rival_300
text: Why did you force my hand?
text_simple: why did you force my hand

name: pa_asan_rival_301
text: I will not ask your forgiveness....
text_simple: i will not ask your forgiveness

name: pa_asan_rival_302
text_simple: a world of suffering upon me

name: pa_asan_rival_303
text: May you rest now. In peace...
text_simple: may you rest now in peace

name: pa_asan_rival_304
text: For once, my blade brings me sorrow...
text_simple: for once my blade brings me sorrow

name: pa_asan_rival_305
text: Now I live my nightmare. And you no longer here to wake me...
text_simple: now i live my nightmare and you no longer here to wake me

name: pa_asan_wheel_all_07
text: I'm not here to protect you.
text_simple: im not here to protect you

name: pa_asan_wheel_all_18
text: I never knew my parents. Yours wish they never knew you.
text_simple: i never knew my parents yours wish they never knew you

name: pa_asan_wheel_deny_02
text: Are you trying to be difficult?
text_simple: are you trying to be difficult
